price: 70. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Miyaanaan kaa reebin inaad (nagala hadasho) dadka15?
footnotes: 15. Waxay ku fali jireen xumaha fuulidda ragga ah martidooda, waxayna u handadeen Luud si uusan uga reebin ficilkaa xun ee khaniisnimada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
